item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2015/06/bbs-ch/#comment-107768">albert</a>.
Because daily :) Not ideal, but I'm living with it.
The quality of a Euro car like the E46 M3 makes me never want to own another Japanese car.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to albert.

Because daily :) Not ideal, but I’m living with it.

The quality of a Euro car like the E46 M3 makes me never want to own another Japanese car.

item.title: By: albert
item.dc:creator: albert
item.description: I still would like to own an e46 m3 one day. What a beaut.. why the SMG?
item.content:encoded: I still would like to own an e46 m3 one day. What a beaut.. why the SMG?
